question: Which of the following about the administration of the dual government of Lord Clive is/ are correct?
option1: The company was the actual Diwan
option2: Mohammed Raza Khan was appointed to control the administration of Bengal
option3: Raja Shitab Rai  was appointed to control the administration of Bihar
explanation: The company was the actual Diwan but two Naib Diwans were responsible for the administrative control of Bengal and Bihar. Mohammed Raza Khan was appointed to control the administration of Bengal and Raja Shitab Rai was appointed to control the administration of Bihar
